title: Just had an aram disappear, and we lost our unused rerolls
body:
Playing aram with 4 friends, started a teamfight. Everyone suddenly had "Attempting to reconnect".

I ALT + F4'd because it never actually does Attempt to reconnect. Logged back in, and the I was in the client, no reconnect game.

Also in our new aram, we all have 0 rerolls. We had unused rerolls before the disconnect. I don't expect them back or anything, just wanted to let it be known.

replies.body: I had this exact problem Yesterday morning. Since this thread is 4 months old, they haven't fixed the problem I see :/
